abstract: Notre Dame will appeal NCAA ruling that it must vacate football team's 2012 and 2013 victories, including national championship game appearance, due to academic improprieties.

headline.print_headline: Notre Dame to Appeal Ruling on Academic Cheating
headline.main: Notre Dame to Appeal Ruling on Academic Cheating by Football Players

snippet: The N.C.A.A. said the university must vacate its football team’s wins from the 2012 and 2013 seasons after eight players received prohibited assistance....
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. said the university must vacate its football team’s wins from the 2012 and 2013 seasons after eight players received prohibited assistance.
